trans-unit.source: Indicates that the COM threading model for an application is multithreaded apartment (MTA).
trans-unit.target: Indica que o modelo de threading COM para um aplicativo é MTA (Multi-Threaded Apartment).

trans-unit.source: Apply this attribute to the entry point method (the `Main()` method in C# and Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Aplicar esse atributo ao método de ponto de entrada (o `Main()` método em c# e Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: It has no effect on other methods.
trans-unit.target: Ele não tem nenhum efeito sobre outros métodos.

trans-unit.source: To set the apartment state of threads you start in your code, use the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method before starting the thread.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o estado de apartment dos threads iniciar no seu código, use o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método antes de iniciar o thread.

trans-unit.source: For an overview of COM threading models, see [Understanding and Using COM Threading Models](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms809971.aspx).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma visão geral de modelos de threading COM, consulte [Compreendendo e usando modelos de Threading COM](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms809971.aspx).

trans-unit.source: COM threading models only apply to applications that use COM interop.
trans-unit.target: Modelos de threading COM se aplicam somente aos aplicativos que usam a interoperabilidade COM.

trans-unit.source: The COM threading model can be set to single-threaded apartment or multithreaded apartment.
trans-unit.target: O modelo de threading COM pode ser definido como single-threaded apartment ou multi-threaded apartment.

trans-unit.source: The application thread is only initialized for COM interop if the thread actually makes a call to a COM component.
trans-unit.target: O thread de aplicativo somente é inicializado para interoperabilidade COM, se o thread realmente faz uma chamada para um componente COM.

trans-unit.source: If COM interop is not used, then the thread is not initialized, and the <xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute> attribute, if it is present, has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Se não for usada a interoperabilidade COM, o thread não foi inicializado e o <xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute> atributo, se estiver presente, não tem nenhum efeito.

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, the default threading model for COM interop depends on the language in which you are developing your application, as the following table shows.
trans-unit.target: Iniciando com o .NET Framework versão 2.0, o padrão de threading de modelo para interoperabilidade COM depende do idioma no qual você está desenvolvendo seu aplicativo, como mostra a tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: Language
trans-unit.target: Idioma

trans-unit.source: COM apartment model
trans-unit.target: Modelo de apartment COM

trans-unit.source: C#
trans-unit.target: C#

trans-unit.source: Multithreaded apartment
trans-unit.target: Multi-threaded apartment

trans-unit.source: Multithreaded apartment
trans-unit.target: Multi-threaded apartment

trans-unit.source: Visual Basic
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic

trans-unit.source: Single-threaded apartment
trans-unit.target: Single-threaded apartment

trans-unit.source: To change these defaults, you use the <xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute> attribute to set the threading model for the application, or call the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method before starting the thread to set the threading model for a particular thread.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar esses padrões, use o <xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute> atributo para definir o modelo de threading do aplicativo ou a chamada a <xref:System.Threading.Thread.SetApartmentState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Threading.Thread.TrySetApartmentState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método antes de iniciar o thread para definir o modelo de threading para um determinado segmento.

trans-unit.source: In C++, you can also use the [/CLRTHREADATTRIBUTE (Set CLR Thread Attribute)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4907e9ef-5031-446c-aecf-0a0b32fae1e8) linker option to specify the apartment model.
trans-unit.target: No C++, você também pode usar o [/CLRTHREADATTRIBUTE (Definir Thread atributo CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4907e9ef-5031-446c-aecf-0a0b32fae1e8) opção de vinculador para especificar o modelo de apartment.

trans-unit.source: Some of the cases in which you want to use the <xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute> attribute to explicitly set the threading model to multithreaded apartment include the following:
trans-unit.target: Alguns dos casos em que você deseja usar o <xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute> atributo para definir explicitamente o modelo de threading para multi-threaded apartment incluem o seguinte:

trans-unit.source: You're developing a Visual Basic app that calls to a C# library that in turn relies on COM interop.
trans-unit.target: Você está desenvolvendo um aplicativo do Visual Basic que chama em uma biblioteca do c# que por sua vez depende de interoperabilidade COM.

trans-unit.source: Because the multithreaded apartment model is the default for C#, you should change your app's threading model to multithreaded by using the <xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Como o modelo de multi-threaded apartment é o padrão para c#, você deve alterar o modelo de threading do seu aplicativo para multithread usando o <xref:System.MTAThreadAttribute> atributo.

trans-unit.source: Your application makes calls to COM components that use the multithreaded apartment model.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo faz chamadas para componentes COM que usam o modelo de multi-threaded apartment.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.MTAThreadAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.MTAThreadAttribute" />.
